TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɑː l s t eɪ l ɚ æ s k ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z f ɹ ʌ m h ɛ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ eɪ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k oʊ f s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɛ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɚ w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ p ɪ t oʊ f ɹ oʊ t oɪ f ɹ p ɹ ʌ m ð ə k iː z ʃ iː k ə n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ eɪ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː l ɡ oʊ t ʊ m iː t h eɪ ɾ w ɛ n ɪ s t eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
